titles.title: To amend title 10, United States Code, to revise the eligibility criteria for the Department of Defense special compensation benefit for certain severely disabled military retirees.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: 7/12/2000--Introduced. Removes the requirement that a veteran's severe service-connected disability must have been rated at least 70 percent disabling by the Secretary of Veterans Affairs as of the date of such veteran's retirement or within four years thereafter in order for such veteran to receive special compensation for such disability.
